name: Heart Invaders
description:
Scroll to the bottom to read my coding desventures XD

Music by Chris Toro

(On the text scenes press enter or space to advance)

I reccommend playing the native versions if you're on windows or linux, the performance is better.

Welp, this is my second jam game! This time I went for a more lore-based approach, tho it's still mostly  gameplay. The player movement and physics, aswell as the visual novel parts and logic are al coded from scratch by me! 

The enemies have an evolution system that makes them randomized, and the ones with the best damage to death ratio  get selected in the next generation to mutate.

You can evolve as well, by picking up power-ups.

The game has 2 different endings and a final boss, as well as an infinite mode for the tryhards.
